results.name: a(n) = A046523(A019565(n) - 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); }; \\ From A046523
